if(!gameState.battleState.isWaveActive){ctx.fillStyle='rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.8)';ctx.fillRect(450,350,100,30);ctx.fillStyle='#FFFFFF';ctx.font='bold 14px Arial';ctx.textAlign='center';ctx.fillText('START WAVE',500,370);}// Pause button

ctx.fillStyle='rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.9)';ctx.fillRect(0,0,canvas.width,canvas.height);// Results panel
ctx.fillStyle='rgba(50, 50, 50, 0.95)';ctx.fillRect(100,50,400,300);ctx.strokeStyle='#FFD700';ctx.lineWidth=3;ctx.strokeRect(100,50,400,300);// Title

ctx.fillStyle='#FFFFFF';ctx.font='16px Arial';ctx.textAlign='left';let yPos=120;ctx.fillText(`Score: ${results.score}`,120,yPos);yPos+=25;if(results.victory){ctx.fillText(`Stars: ${'â­'.repeat(results.starsEarned)}`,120,yPos);yPos+=25;ctx.fillText('Rewards:',120,yPos);yPos+=20;results.rewards.forEach(reward=>{const icon={gold:'ðŸ’°',exp:'â­',gem:'ðŸ’Ž'}[reward.type]||'ðŸŽ';ctx.fillText(`${icon} +${reward.amount}`,140,yPos);yPos+=20;});if(results.newUnlocks.length>0){yPos+=10;ctx.fillStyle='#FFD700';results.newUnlocks.forEach(unlock=>{ctx.fillText(`ðŸ”“ ${unlock}`,120,yPos);yPos+=20;});}}// Continue button
